title: Team Configuration
description: Learn to set up CLAUDE.md for team projects, including shared standards, onboarding info, and consistent behavior across developers.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Team Configuration

Set up CLAUDE.md so all team members have a consistent Claude Code experience.

## Objectives
1. Create comprehensive team documentation
2. Include onboarding information for new developers
3. Document team conventions and standards
4. Add troubleshooting guidance

hints.text: Team CLAUDE.md files should be comprehensive enough for a new developer to get started.
Try: 'Create a team-friendly CLAUDE.md with onboarding info, all commands, coding standards, and troubleshooting'

Ask: 'Create CLAUDE.md for a team project: 1) Project overview 2) Getting started (clone, npm install, setup) 3) All npm scripts explained 4) Coding standards (TypeScript, no any, eslint rules) 5) Git workflow (branch naming, PR process) 6) Common issues and fixes'

solution.approach: Create a comprehensive CLAUDE.md that serves as team documentation.
solution.example: Create complete team documentation in CLAUDE.md covering all aspects of the project
alternativeApproaches: Build an onboarding-friendly CLAUDE.md for the team
Document everything a new team member needs to know

learningPoints: CLAUDE.md should work for all team members, not just the author
Include setup instructions, commands, and conventions
Good CLAUDE.md reduces onboarding time for both humans and Claude
